function RYU_EP04_10()
    -- .承-1【11月第3週】「決別、そして決意」
    SaveData.Title = "決別、そして決意"

    -- //BG：駅前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ After agreeing to the Princess Election with Daria, Erika kindly escorted me all the way to the station nearest to my home. ]])

    MSG([[ Somehow, I feel like I have a reliable lover now. Though I'm sure Erika hasn't thought that far. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU02fc")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0634.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】wry smile
 "Erika, thank you for accompanying me all the way this far. It's already quite dark, are you okay with that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1825.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】smile
 "I'm totally fine. You remember the incident at the entrance ceremony, right? I learned well what would happen if some pervert tried to attack me." ]])

    MSG([[ Speaking of the entrance ceremony incident, the pervert disturbance where Erika single-handedly dealt with a troubling man. ]])

    MSG([[ I know very well that Erika is a martial artist who can hold her own against Daria. ]])

    MSG([[ Realizing my question had been a bit shallow, I gave a faint smile in return. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1826.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】normal
 "If anything strange happens around you, please contact me. Even if it's into the fire or water. No matter what, I will rush to Uran's side." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0635.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】smile
 "Hehe, that’s reassuring. Would you come even if I called you while bathing?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1827.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered
 "P-Please only call me in an emergency!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Talking with Erika eases the pain of Daria's betrayal. ]])

    MSG([[ I tried to appear as unaffected as possible, but the betrayal of a friend from the very start of the school year truly hurt. ]])

    MSG([[ She was very talented in everything except for the horrible physical contact. ]])

    MSG([[ Especially with Lady Marika, she was on very close terms. I had secretly assumed the two of them shared feelings for each other... ]])

    MSG([[ That, perhaps, was my own naivety. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0636.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】smile
 "Erika, please rest assured. I, Uran, vow on the name of the Ryuguuin family that I will definitely save Lady Marika." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1828.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】smile
 "Yes, I believe you. I’ll lead the Erika faction in supporting you, Uran." ]])

    MSG([[ Erika is smiling right in front of me. ]])

    MSG([[ Her lovely face looks just like my revered Lady Marika, yet somehow different. ]])

    MSG([[ If there are forces that seek to dim this smile, I will oppose them with all my might. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if it means facing the Himegami family — and ultimately the 'Phoenix' group. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_11")
end
